footer_text: FIRST Tech Challenge Team from Moldova
hero_subtitle: A passionate team of young engineers competing in FIRST Tech Challenge
story_text1: Axis FTC #28128 is a rookie team based in Chișinău, Moldova. We formed in 2023 with a shared passion for robotics and technology.
story_text2: Our team consists of 12 dedicated students from various high schools, working together to design, build, and program competition robots.
team_subtitle: Dedicated students passionate about robotics and technology
desc1: Lead designer and programmer with 3 years of robotics experience
desc2: Specializes in CAD design and mechanical systems
goals_subtitle: What drives us to innovate and compete
goal1_desc: Achieve top rankings in regional and national competitions
goal2_desc: Develop cutting-edge robotic solutions using innovative technologies
goal3_desc: Foster a collaborative environment where every member contributes
goal4_desc: Promote STEM education in our local community
goal5_desc: Build relationships with technology companies and universities
goal6_desc: Help members develop technical and professional skills
contact_subtitle: We'd love to hear from sponsors, partners, and fellow teams
trademark: FIRST® is a registered trademark of For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology.
